coreAttributes.authorTag: An added tag near the neck reads "STITCHED WITH MALICE BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M"
coreAttributes.name: Paletot
coreAttributes.description: A Paletot, a heavy cloak made of unknown fabrics. Mostly worn for protection from cold and wind, but also works as a heat guard and even provides a moderate amount of padding.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc.her] shoulders, before fastening the pins.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before fastening the pins.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before firmly fastening the pins.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the pins around [npc.her] neck, before taking off [npc.her] cloak.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the pins around [npc2.namePos] neck, before taking off [npc2.her] cloak.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the pins around [npc2.namePos] neck, before pulling off [npc2.her] cloak.
